attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: After I downloaded this app, my boyfriend broke up with me, a tornado destroyed my town, I became lactose intolerant and I love ice cream, and Caucasian James was unverified on Twitter. It was all because of this app. I am getting evidence and am prepared to talk with the app manufacturers. Don’t let this app ruin your livelihood and destroy your life!!!!!!

attributes.title: Poopy
attributes.review: This app literally gave my phone so many viruses I can’t deal with how bad it is. It started insulting all the other apps and my phone and even built a little wall to separate itself from all my other apps. Unbelievable.

attributes.title: WORST APP IVE EVER USED
attributes.review: I cannot believe this is still on the app store. the format is abhorrent and disgusting. glitches constantly. honestly made me MORE LIBERAL??? like i’m just confused why he made such a liberal, leftist app supporting socialism and communism. i thought trump was for conservatives but i guess this shows his true colors smh😔

attributes.title: Not worth the iCloud space
attributes.review: Absolutely horrible app, it glitches all the time and is overall horrible. Plus the actual name of the app just makes it 100 percent worse. Hope this gets removed ASAP

attributes.title: Gave me aids
attributes.review: I was getting this app for my hubby trump daddy 🥴🥴🥴😫😫😫❤️❤️❤️😚🥰😍🤪🤪 but when I opened but when it was loading my dog died 😖😭😭😭😭😢😢😢😢🤬🤬🤬🤬🤯🤯😳😤😤😤😭😭😭 and I really do blame it on this app because when my poor baby dog died he turn orange 🍊 Like my hottie of a president. So that’s why I gave this a one star review 😤😤😤

attributes.title: such a horrible app.
attributes.review: it is glitching and made my entire phone slow down. my phone froze and i had to do a hard reset so get it back to normal. one of my friends has it too and it did the same thing. i’m not sure who made the app, but it isn’t made well and is so slow and screwed up my entire phone. you would think the actual president would make his app at least a little better. please fix it .

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Worst app ever I was expecting low expectations about this app and I was so surprised it was way worse than I thought. And trump your already getting hated on enough, so why don’t you stop caring about yourself and for others by not banning TikTok .

attributes.title: An Absolutely Terrible App.
attributes.review: This app didn’t have as much games as I thought it would have, and all the jokes that I read weren’t funny. The graphics and mascot sucked. There is an infinite room for improvement, I do not recommend.

attributes.title: TRUMP NEEDS TO DELETE THE APP
attributes.review: I got this so I can support the GREATEST president ever, but the app was just awful. So many glitches and the notifications was bad. I don’t like how it’s set up and I’m not tech savvy. I thought Trump could set up a nice app, but it is awful. My husband doesn’t approve it either.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to show support to our president but as soon as i did, i received a call with terrible news that my cat ran away. i loved my cat so much, my heart is broken. too make matters worse, i ordered pizza that night to cheer up but they messed up my order and gave me pineapple instead of jalapeños. i’ve had nothing but terrible luck ever since getting this app, i really hope you won’t make the same mistake. horrible app, don’t download ✨
